title: The Scholar's Doubt
goal: Kaelen finds a potential ally in a scholar, Elara, who is also investigating the strange occurrences.

beats.summary: Kaelen encounters Elara, a brilliant but ostracized scholar, who is also researching the inconsistencies in ancient histories and recent strange events.
Elara is initially wary of Kaelen's claims but is intrigued by his knowledge of forgotten languages and lore.
They share information, realizing their paths are converging on the same mystery, though Elara remains skeptical of Kaelen's 'awakened' status.
